import React from'react';import'./OCRProjects.css';import config from'../config';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OCRProjects=_ref=>{let{onBack,onEyePrescriptionBotClick,onOCRMultilingualFormsClick,onInvoiceExtractionClick}=_ref;const projects=[{id:'eye-prescription-bot',title:'Eye Prescription Bot',image:'EyePrescriptionBot.jpg'},{id:'ocr-multilingual-forms',title:'OCR on Multilingual Forms',image:'OCROnMultilingualForms.png'},{id:'invoice-extraction-automation',title:'Invoice Extraction and Automation',image:'InvoiceExtractionAndAutomation.png'}];const handleImageError=imageName=>e=>{console.log("".concat(imageName," failed to load, trying alternative paths..."));const baseName=imageName.split('/').pop();const imagePaths=["/".concat(baseName),"/images/".concat(baseName),"http://localhost:5000/images/".concat(baseName)];const currentSrc=e.target.src;const currentIndex=imagePaths.findIndex(path=>currentSrc.includes(baseName));if(currentIndex<imagePaths.length-1){e.target.src=imagePaths[currentIndex+1];}else{// Placeholder if all paths fail
e.target.src='data:image/svg+xml;base64,';console.log("All ".concat(imageName," paths failed, using placeholder"));}};const handleProjectClick=projectId=>{console.log("Clicked on project: ".concat(projectId));if(projectId==='eye-prescription-bot'&&onEyePrescriptionBotClick){onEyePrescriptionBotClick();}else if(projectId==='ocr-multilingual-forms'&&onOCRMultilingualFormsClick){onOCRMultilingualFormsClick();}else if(projectId==='invoice-extraction-automation'&&onInvoiceExtractionClick){onInvoiceExtractionClick();}else{console.log("".concat(projectId," functionality coming soon"));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ocr-projects-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ocr-projects-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ocr-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"back-button",onClick:onBack,"aria-label":"Go back to main projects",children:"\u2190 Back"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"ocr-title",children:"Optical Character Recognition Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"ocr-subtitle",children:"Explore my OCR and document processing projects"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects-grid",children:projects.map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"project-button",onClick:()=>handleProjectClick(project.id),"aria-label":"View ".concat(project.title," project details"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:config.getImagePath(project.image),alt:project.title,className:"project-image",onError:handleImageError(project.image),onLoad:()=>console.log("".concat(project.title," image loaded successfully!"))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"project-title",children:project.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"project-arrow",children:"\u2192"})]})},project.id))})]})});};export default OCRProjects;
